title: LVL 6
body: just trying to get my account to sync

replies.body: What's your current summoner name?  I'll take a look and see if I can refresh your account here on the boards.  Let me know!
Faxx10 and thank you any help would be appriecated.

I've done a refresh for that summoner, but I'm not sure if you're posting from the right account!  Hit us up in through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so we make sure we're both looking at the right account.  We'll get back to you asap!
